body_html:
Hm, it's frustrating that the hash on the GitHub copy can change.

What kind of retry logic is there around trying to fetch from mirror.bazel.build, in the case of transient errors? If we can't rely on the github copy's hash to validate then we should try really hard not to get that one, I would think...

body:
Hm, it's frustrating that the hash on the GitHub copy can change.

What kind of retry logic is there around trying to fetch from mirror.bazel.build, in the case of transient errors? If we can't rely on the github copy's hash to validate then we should try really hard not to get that one, I would think...
